DOC.detailed_description: Through long-term clinical practice，acupuncture treatment facial paralysis generally prove effective；the large number ancient modern medical literature also suggest acupuncture beneficial facial paralysis . However , scientific basis still need establish make sure efficacy acupuncture recognize internationally.This study adopt series international practice scale , House Brackmann Scale , Facial Disability Index ( FDI ) , World Health Organization Quality Life-BREF ( WHOQOL-BREF ) , Cattell Personality Factors ( 16PF ) , Cancellation test evaluate role deqi neuropsychological factor acupuncture treatment Bell 's Palsy .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Patients diagnosed unilateral facialnerve weakness without identifiable cause within 168 hour onset symptom ; 2. age 18 65 year .
